snippet: Some of the diaries, contracts, letters and other documents from the American Ballet Theater will go on view next week.
abstract: American Ballet Theater is donating some 50,000 documents to Library of Congress; gift is being celebrated with exhibition, American Ballet Theater, Touring the Globe for 75 Years, and will showcase scrapbooks, photographs, diaries, contracts, letters and other papers in collection documenting dance company's illustrious history.
lead_paragraph: Some of the diaries, contracts, letters and other documents from the American Ballet Theater will go on view next week.

headline.main: Ballet Theater Donating Trove of Materials to Library of Congress
headline.print_headline: Dance Trove Is Headed to Library of Congress
